abstract: Hervé Falciani, the computer specialist formerly employed by HSBC and involved in its enormous Swiss data leak, says he was once kidnapped by the Mossad.
snippet: Hervé Falciani, the computer specialist formerly employed by HSBC and involved in its enormous Swiss data leak, says he was once kidnapped by the Mossad.

headline.main: Swiss Data Source Says Mossad Kidnapped Him
